Class Message

java.lang.Object
  xdi2.messaging.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Message>
public final class Message
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Message>

An XDI message, represented as a context node.

markus

Checks if an entity singleton is a valid XDI message.

Parameters:

Returns:

createOperation

public Operation createOperation(XRI3Segment operationXri,
                                 XRI3Segment targetXri)
Creates a new operation and adds it to this XDI message.

Parameters:
operationXri - The operation XRI to use for the new operation.
targetXri - The target XRI to which the operation applies.
Returns:
The newly created, empty operation, or null if the operation XRI is not valid.
